verses.text: Those who trust in the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*are like Mount Zion, that cannot be moved, but abides forever.
Round Jerusalem are the mountains, and the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*is round his people from now and for evermore.
For he will not suffer the sceptre of wrong to rest on the land allotted to the righteous; else the righteous might put forth their own hand to evil.
Do good, O \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, to the good, and to the true-hearted.
But those who swerve into crooked ways will the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*lead away with the workers of evil. Peace be upon Israel.
